Play.PlayDescription: (:35) 10-V.Young kneels to TEN 39 for -1 yards. NE largest margin of victory in franchise history (56 pts in 56-3 win over NY Jets, 9/9/79). NE 59 pts most in NFL since 11/10/96 (St. Louis beat Atlanta, 59-16). NE 59-0 shutout victory ties largest shutout victory since AFL-NFL merger in 1970 (LA Rams beat Atlanta 59-0 on 12/4/76).
